"When tolerance is threatened, we must speak out." 

Ban Ki-moon on #ToleranceDay https://t.co/EMBMf0gcWL #UN4RefugeesMigrants https://t.co/HTV6dUu2Ip
World leaders are making climate action & #ParisAgreement commitments at #COP22 in Marrakech. Here's one example from Chile's @mbachelet. https://t.co/gGRSXRfS87
#ParisAgreement must deliver for women & girls -- @UN_Women on the #COP22 Marrakech opportunity https://t.co/7cXX4PQMgC #GlobalGoals

At #COP22: Developed countries pledge $23 million to help share technology with developing countries to mitigate and adapt to climate change https://t.co/S86MWsXUKz
Wednesday is Intl Day for Tolerance. How can intolerance be countered? 5 ideas are here: https://t.co/LACZUVQwWl #ToleranceDay
